statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%AT%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE 'ACGT%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sequence_id, LENGTH(sequence) AS sequence_length FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY sequence_length DESC;
SELECT MAX(sequence_id) AS max_sequence_id FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence, label FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY label DESC;
SELECT id, sequence, label FROM dna_sequences WHERE label = 'sample';
SELECT sequence_id, analysis_result FROM sequence_analysis WHERE analysis_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE label = 'Example1';
SELECT label, sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences INNER JOIN sequence_analysis ON dna_sequences.id = sequence_analysis.sequence_id WHERE analysis_result = true;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sequences FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, label, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence_id, dna_sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description, creator FROM sequence_metadata WHERE creator='John Smith';
SELECT sequence_id, analysis_result FROM sequence_analysis WHERE sequence_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences JOIN sequence_metadata ON dna_sequences.sequence_id = sequence_metadata.sequence_id;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT id, dna_sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sequence_id, COUNT(*) AS sequence_count FROM sequence_metadata GROUP BY sequence_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT sequence_analysis.id, sequence_metadata.description FROM sequence_analysis JOIN sequence_metadata ON sequence_analysis.sequence_id = sequence_metadata.sequence_id;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%ATG%' AND dna_sequence NOT LIKE '%TAG%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT gene_name FROM genes WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM genes JOIN mutations ON genes.gene_id = mutations.gene_id;
SELECT mutation_date, mutation_details FROM mutations_info WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM genes INNER JOIN mutations ON genes.gene_id = mutations.gene_id;
SELECT gene_name, sequence_id FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT mutations.mutation_type, mutations_info.mutation_date, mutations_info.mutation_details FROM mutations INNER JOIN mutations_info ON mutations.mutation_id = mutations_info.mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE id IN (SELECT sequence_id FROM genes WHERE gene_name = 'Gene1');
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT organism, length FROM sequence_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT annotation FROM sequence_annotations WHERE annotation_type = 'Gene';
SELECT sequence_id, similar_sequence_id, similarity_score FROM sequence_similarity WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sequence_metadata WHERE length > 500 AND organism='E. coli';
SELECT sequence_id, COUNT(annotation_id) AS num_annotations FROM sequence_annotations GROUP BY sequence_id HAVING num_annotations > 3;
SELECT s.sequence_id, s.sequence, r.reference_title FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_references r ON s.sequence_id = r.sequence_id ORDER BY s.sequence_id ASC, r.publication_date DESC;
